âœ¨ Key Features: â€¢ Universal text selection via right-click â€¢ Integration with multiple AI platforms (ChatGPT, Claude, etc.) â€¢ Directly sends selected text to AI chat interfaces â€¢ Allows modification of prompts before sending to AI
ðŸ“– Summary: AI Anywhere is a browser extension that streamlines the process of using AI tools with web content. It allows users to right-click on any selected text and send it directly to a chosen AI chat interface, eliminating the need for copy-pasting. This facilitates faster research, deeper analysis, and more efficient prompt creation by seamlessly integrating web content with AI tools.
